alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, northeastern Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Kings Bay Base to near Oceanway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Mayport, Amelia City, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline, Talbot Island and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
